Everything seemed to happen all to quickly. You didn't expect anything like this to happen in a million years. It all seems like a strange syfy movie. Your scared and unsure what to do and now you will continue your life. Well let's bring it back to where it all began.

But today was different. It felt eerily like a fall afternoon. There was a chilly wind which just reinforced the theme of the day.

Just as you normally do you were on your walk home from school. As you were walking along the wooded area along the road something in the brush caught your eye. It almost looked like a bright metallic blue which really stood out from the green brush. You had nothing better to do today so you decided to check it out.

It almost looked like some blue goo, maybe about to handfuls big. But there was something really intriguing about it. You stuck your hand out to reach and touch it and perhaps pick it up. Your not even sure if you can even move around. But slowly you kinda figure out how to and now you can slither around.

There's no way your going to reach your house at this speed by slithering. It must be passedone 5 pm and your parents are probably worried sick about you. "Well I guess I'm staying out here for the night, until I can figure all this out." You thought. Finding a spot off the road and by a tree you will probably keep yourself here for the night.

It's getting dark and you have so much racing though your mind. One of the thoughts your have that there is a military base located in town and maybe this is one of their special products. You really have no idea and you'll wait til tomorrow to find out. You hear some leaves cracking behind you and as you look back you see a wolf of some kind. You remember your dad telling you there's wolves here in the woods.

The animal comes over to you and starts to sniff. Then something bizarre happens. The wolf starts to luck you up. You feel yourself pass into some warm cavities in it's mouth. Your first thought is that your going to die buts that's not what happens at all. All a sudden you are looking out a set of eyes about two feet off the ground. You feel four paws and you have a tail now. Your now in b intro of the wolf now! Testing your new powers you run through the woods and around trees. It's suprisingly a lot of fun. This is something you could get used to.

Now since you were able to possess an animal maybe you could possess a human. It was getting dark and maybe you would have to stay in the wolf's body over night. Just as the thought crossed your mind you heard more footsteps this time and you looked around and noticed a man in hunting gear. He probably was out hunting for the today and now was going home since it was getting dark. You really wanted to see if you could possess the guy and get out of the wolf and back into a human form.

After puking yourself out of the wolf you slithered on the ground and snuck up behind the guy. Going unnoticed you jumped onto his boot, you were hoping he didn't notice you. Crawling, you made your way into his boot and fell onto his foot. You were getting tossed around by his walking and needed to focus. You made your way out of his boot and up his pants leg. Suddenly he stopped and you realized he noticed you. "Shit, shit, shit, what do I do?" So just on instinct you tried to press yourself into his leg. Unsure if it would work you decidea to give it a try. As you did you felt yourself slowly take over the man's body. First his legs then his torso and arms and finally head, he began to shake all over and you started to feel bad for him. He ended up dropping his bow and other equipment. But as soon you started to possess him you now had full control as you gain your vision and looked through his eyes for the first time. You were human once again.

Immediately you're extremely confused and worried it's a worker from the army base that's found you. But all worries fade away as he turns and you see his face. Its one of Shane's childhood friends.

"Yo whose my favorite guy?" As Shane's friend, Antonio shouts from across the room. A little thrown off about why he's doing here you say confused, "Hey what's going on man? What are you doing here?"

"I'm here on assignment and I realized that you lived here so I figured I'd surprise you," as his voice booms. "Well you definitely did," you say as you set your bag down. You go over to him and you give each other a bro hug. While you're hugging him you feel his strong muscled body. He's filling out his uniform in all the right places.

You ask him to sit down and offer him a drink. You take off your jacket and have a drink with him on the couch. You guys talk for what seems like hours. He explains why he's here and what's been going on in his life and you do the same. Which is really nice to talk to someone like this.

The suns starting to go down and Antonio says he should be getting back to the base. You agree because you are tired and a little excited to be exploring your new body later.

Just as you're saying your goodbyes you turn to get something in the kitchen, Antonio calls out, "Hey I gotta hand it to you, I was almost fooled. You did an amazing job. This is so impressive."

You turn around and do a 180. By now Antonio is standing right in front of you. You're left speechless. All you could muster to say was, "What are you talking about?"

"Dude I know you're not Shane, I know how you got your power to take over people." This is chilling. You were so close into the clear. "Don't worry, I'm not here to arrest you or take you into the base to be probed. You didn't do anything wrong. You weren't sure what happened to you and didn't know what was going on. But I am going to ask of you to come with me to the base so the scientists there can get a good look at you. They had no idea the stuff they were working on was this advanced and they want to interview you. Once they found out you were in Shane's body they asked me to come because Shane and I are best friends. They wanted to see how believable you were. So will you come with me to the base?"

Your mind is reeling from all this but eventually cough up and say "Yeah I guess the gig is up." You chuckle. "I'll come with you." But inside you're not completely certain that this guy is telling the truth. He still works for the government and he's not fully trustworthy. So you have a little plan developing in your mind. You turn around and cough a bit of your goo into your hands. Antonio is hunched over picking through his bag for something. Slowly you approach him from behind, making sure you do this right, you take your hands and smother his face.

He turns right around and you can see his eyes bulge. Before he can do anything about this he collapses to the ground. You lift his heavy set body onto the couch. You were unsure if this was going to work, but it was worth a shot. You feel your goo work it's way into Antonio and you feel you're gaining control.

You start talking to him, "Antonio, Antonio are you there?" After a few times you hear Antonio's body say the same words. You say " Testing one two, one two," and he repeats the same thing. Then now feeling control of his body you begin to crack your head, flex your arms, and feel your strong abs. Just as you're doing this you realize Shane is doing the same exact thing. Then you try to just think about Antonio and almost seamlessly he is under your control only. With a little work you have him walking around on his own without moving Shane. "This is incredible," you say as Antonio while looking into a mirror. As Antonio you're staring back at Shane who is almost like a statue. Then you refocus on Shane and you are back into his body and Antonio is now a statue.

"This is too amazing I now have control of these two guys perfectly
112112221.title: Shane's best friend stops by

1121122212.content:
"So I guess the military wanted me to come in for questioning," you say as you look at Antonio who is frozen in place. Smirking to yourself you pace around your apartment you try to figure out what to do.

The best thing you could probably do now is try to read Antonio's memory to see what the military wants. There has to be more to his story. The government is never that lucid. Maybe it's years of conspiracy theories but something tells you this isn't the full story.

Staring back at you is an undeniably handsome reflection. You have short, manicured hair along with brown eyes. Your olive skin makes you look healthy as ever. Your muscles now are even more bigger than Shane's. Seeing your military uniform gives you this sense of power and intimidation. All you want to do is tear off the uniform to expose your body underneath. Now fully concentrating on Antonio's mind you try to figure out what's going on.

You learn all about Antonio's childhood and how is father left him as a kid and how Shane and him are best friends from elementary school. You take note of his strong Spanish heritage and see that Spanish was his first language.

"Yo soy Antonio. Yo tengo veinticinco años y tres hermanos. Sandía es mi fruta favorita. Yo trabajo para gobierno de Estados Unidos." You could just go on and on speaking in Antonio's fluent Spanish. This also means that you not only can disguise yourself as the person but you also inherit their abilities.

Antonio was also into mixed martial arts for awhile, you see. You perform over a dozen moves flawlessly while tapping into his memory. "Antonios or I still got the moves. These can come in handy."

Now you tap into more of his memories to see if he was telling the truth. After a few moments you basically get a grasp of the situation. Most of what he was telling you is actually true. The scientists and researchers there didn't know that their concoction was this far advanced. To their knowledge they did not know that you can spilt yourself up to control multiple hosts either. That's why they only sent Antonio here to get you. Since if you tried to take Antonio, Shane would recover and you would still have him to contend with. Also they didn't know that you can attain a hosts memories or abilities. Antonio knew that once the scientists found this out they were going to probe you and try to change you back.

After seeing what you can do this is pretty amazing and you don't really want to go back to your life. You can control anyone you please and be a carbon copy of them.

Now you're more and more curious about what's going on at the base. Since you are now controlling a captain who is stationed at the army base, this would be a perfect opportunity to explore.

By now it's getting pretty late and you know Antonio needs to get back to the base soon so he doesn't raise suspicion. As you're thinking of what to do your phone rings, it's the base.
1121122212.title: Practice Makes Perfect

11211222121.content:
Hesitantly you answer the call from the base. You know it's from your general whose in charge of the whole operation. He's about to have Antonio's... rather your head since you were supposed to return to the base over an hour ago. Almost shaking you answer the phone.

"Alvarez where the fuck are you? You were supposed to be back over an hour ago.

"I'm sorry general there is no excuse for not calling you. The subject had left Shane's body before I could get to him. Shane is completely normal from what I could observe. I just got carried away talking with him since it's been so long since I have been able too."

You can hear the general slam his fist into his desk. "Captain it's alright. Just make sure to let me know everything that is happening. This is an extremely important situation we have ongoing here. We need to catch this thing before anything serious happens and this leaks out into the public. "

"Message received, I'll report back to the base right away." The general agrees and you hang up.

That wasn't so bad you think to yourself. You're now looking into a mirror and see Antonio's reflection glaring back at you. This was a lot easier with the help of Antonio's memories.

Glancing over you spot the elephant in the room "Oh Shane what are we going to do with you?" You question him, but of course he doesn't answer. Now you contemplate your next move. The best idea seems to see if you can depossess Shane and focus yourself into Antonio. Since you are going to use him to get into the base.

Slowly you begin to focus yourself out of Shane. You walk over to where he is slumped over the couch and see your goo flowing out of his mouth. Within a few moments it's over with. Shane though, is still passed out. You gather up a few things that Antonio happened to leave before, and leave before Shane even wakes up.
11211222121.title: Answer that phone

choices: Ricky's fantasy is a threesome with two of the hottest cheerleaders at school
Ricky's fantasy is gay sex with the football quarterback
You're too horny right now!  The fantasy must wait!
1123.content:
As much as you enjoy the strength and masculinity of Mike's body, you are just dying to take sexy Ricky for a spin. He may be 14, but you can tell he's already on his way to being a fit, strong young man. His early interest in the outdoors and, based on Mike's memories, rising stardom as his high school's first ever freshman varsity basketball MVP have given him a degree of muscle mass and tone unheard of for someone his age. If you weren't currently possessing his father's body and mind you would absolutely bet twenty bucks that he was at least 17, especially given his height of 6'2". Even the hair on his legs and that early onset five o' clock shadow have you further wondering how any boy could be so manly. You wanted that for yourself. What would that stardom and popularity feel like? What would it be like to have a model physique and to be able to run your fingertips over chiseled abs along your torso? You were about to find out...

Quickly, you work out your plan in your head and set events into motion. You see Kyle leaping down the stairs while Ricky is still picking sneakers or something like that. Mustering up all your fatherly charm you toss Kyle the keys to Mike's prized vintage corvette and tell Kyle to turn heads, but to be careful. Kyle is dumbfounded and so happy and appreciative of this fatherly gesture, but he comes back to earth for a second to ask what about Ricky. Before you can even finish the lie about Ricky all of a sudden feeling ill, Kyle is already out the door hopping in his hot ride for the day. Using Mike's past memories you determine that his wife is loaded with errands clear until carpool this afternoon. That leaves an unsuspecting Ricky alone and to your own devices...

Walking up the stairs you try with your mightiest effort to noiselessly move Mike's mighty frame. Reaching the top of the stairs you listen for a sec and hear what sounds like shoe laces being tied. Ricky zooms out of his room almost into your chest and freezes from the unexpectedness.

"Sorry, Dad. Didn't know you were there. Sorry for keeping you waiting. I-"

"Son," you reply, "you forgot your backpack"

"Oh shit! One sec I'll be right bac-"

Jumping into action, you rush Ricky and push him through the doorway the instance his back turns. The shock knocks the air out of him and you use this chance to take full advantage of Mike's larger and beefier frame- wrestling Ricky onto his back and pinning him down with your solid torso.

"DAD! What the freaking hell are you doing?! Get the fuck off me!"

Ricky clenches his teeth and tries with all his might to pull free, but you easily keep his arms pinned. Waiting for the right moment you suddenly see your opening. Right as Ricky opens his mouth wide open to scream for help, you lunge your mouth forward and lock lips onto his. Ricky is screaming into your mouth, but you do not let up on this kiss of transfer. Your essence immediately begins leaving Mike's body as it floods into Ricky's wide open mouth. Ricky shakes uncontrollably and stops gasping for help as you begin to feel light-headed. Ricky's eyes are closed and he has a slightly uncomfortable look on his face as you black out and the last of your essence cascades down Ricky's throat with a slosh.

BLINK

Suddenly your vision has refocused and you take a hulking gasp of air. You breathe in the smell of manly cologne and that's when you realize Mike, or your Dad now, is passed out on top of you. You are able to push him to the side now that he's out like a light.

"Had a fun ride, Dad, but I'm going to be enjoying this young body all day today."

Holy crap you loved hearing that voice. It was such a cool guy type of voice--the type that people would gladly obey. And now it was yours. God-something about controlling such an alpha-man in the making was getting you going. Or was it just Ricky's insane testosterone levels? Definitely both. You stand up on limber yet strong legs and walk over to the mirror smiling and trying out all sorts of goofy and sexy faces that this body most definitely never displayed...until now...

You take off Ricky's sneakers and socks and examine your new size 13 feet. Even his feet were beautiful! They had that athletic look and weren't overly hairy--perfect for wearing some fratty flip flops. You bend over and feel your hairy calves, getting an electric rush as you massage your calves up to your lean inner thighs. A shiver surges down your spine and you tear off Ricky's shorts, leaving on his boxer briefs for the sake of saving the best for last. But holy fuck, you can clearly see a monster snake under those briefs that is already inflating and more and more the longer you stare at Ricky's bod--No, your body.

Taking off this T-shirt you laugh like a giddy kid as you run your hands up and down your toned torso with absolute amazement.

"This kid could be a freaking Calvin Klein model today! Well now 'I' can!"

You keep caressing these toned abs, reveling in their ridges and ripples, squeezing your perfectly carved pecs and groaning whenever you accidentally brush up against your sensitive nipples. Your new cock is completely hard at this point and threatening to tear your Calvins to shreds from the tension. It must be at least 8 inches hard and THICK! Holy crap, this kid is a god. And you get to benefit from that from now on if you wish.

Getting a little carried away with yourself, you forgot about the Dad problem. He is still out of it on your new bed, but he is starting to jostle and grunt a bit. Taking preemptive action you decide to experiment with your power as you spit a pea sized amount of your essence into your hand. Walking over to Dad, you place the pea drop on his mouth and direct it to enter and find the brain. It slides through Dad's lips obediently and as it travels through his system you witness first-hand as his body tenses and seizes before he grabs at his head, moaning in a knowing vocalization of self-defeat. Dad screams at the ceiling with all his might as his back arches, the veins on his neck and arms bulging to the max, before he collapses back onto your bed with a thud that vibrates the room. He is breathing heavily and blinking with curiosity as if he were just now discovering the concept of self-awareness.

"Dad?" you ask.

"Yes, Ricky?" he asks softly as he turns his head and flashes you a satisfied smile.

"How are you feeling?"

"I've never felt better in my life!" he exclaims with childish splendor, "I'm so excited by the thought of following your orders. You are my master, and I will do anything for you. It feels so good just saying that!"

You are shocked, but in a good way. This outcome is even better than you imagined!

"Dad, here are your first orders. You'll go out for the rest of the day and leave me to my own devices. When we're alone you can act like this, but if anyone else is around in person or on the phone you have to be your regular self. Also, you are aware of my identity and are completely fine with it. In fact, you will serve as an occasional vessel along with being my helper for acquiring new bodies. Now go have a great day, and be sure to call the school and tell them I have a fever and uncontrollable vomiting--something to get me out of school and practice for the day."

As Dad searches for his corvette keys you tell him to just take the family jeep and he beams a smile as he scoops up the keys and walks out the door.

"Wow, what a day," you muse to yourself, "Okay, Ricky, let's search that pretty head of yours and see about making a fantasy come true."

Your new manhood begins engorging the moment those words leave your succulent new lips.
1123.title: How about taking Ricky for a spin?

choices: Take a bit of control of Justin
11232.content:
Wow, being Ricky is great! You get redressed in cargo shorts and tank top, both colours going great with Ricky's, i mean your tan skin. grabbing Ricky's phone and slipping on some Vans means you're ready to go get your game on with one of the hunky jocks on the football team. Ricky's dad took the truck to work so you guess you'll have to bike to school.

Boy, does the wind feel good blowing through your new styled-to-perfection hair. The bike ride was refreshing but you can't wait to get to school. You sneak in through the gate to football practice (which is nearing its end) and take a peek at the hunks on the field. You can see Justin, number 48, the quarterback making an amazing play. "I can't get too distracted" you think to yourself and sneak over into the locker room. Breathing in the manly scent of sweat and testosterone is wildly invigorating for Ricky's nostrils. Hiding in the bathroom stall, you hear all the jocks coming in from practice, all shouting and smiling. They all strip and change back into their street clothes and one by one leave school.

Justin, like usual, stays behind. He's always the last to go home, and now it's just you and him in the locker room.
11232.title: heading out

13.content: Do you want to see what it's like be a wolf and possess the wolf again?
13.title: Something else

choices: Get out and hitch on another ride.
14.content:
Your non-existent heart contorts and seems to be crushed by something. Everything around turned into a mix of colors, every sound a sickly soup of garbled noises except one.

"Incapacitating drug worked. Target currently disoriented. Moving in to contain." A voice above said.

"Permission granted." Another voice. Much deeper and masked with static.

Whatever these people are, they seem to be trying to catch you. The man you once tried to posses reaches down to touch. Most expectations dictate this his hands would just pass through you since you are liquid. In this case, it's not. His hands is sparking and some strange energy allowed your parts that he touched turn tangible. It was unnerving and you struggled to let go. You form an appendage and tried to punch the man. He did not see that coming and it striked him in the eyes. With a momentary disorientation, his hold of you loosened. The opportunity is possible in the smallest window of time. You hit him again and you find yourself launched free from his grasp.

In the wide perspective, you could see him both fall off the ground and the trees you swiftly try to swerve as you escape. He was dazed but nor for long. As he grew smaller over the horizon, he rushes to the direction you ran off too and all the while, he was talking over the walk talky strapped on his chest. Aside from the wide perspective this goo gave you, you could also sense the slightest vibration in the air and as so, you could faintly hear what he and that walk talky is saying.

"Subject turned aggressive and ran away, sir?."

"The subject gives off a specific radiation. Turn on your tracker D-124." The man turned something on his wrists and dashed to where you are running from. He was more accurate now and far more determined. The run, more like slither, was exhausting yet you kept going. The distance between you shortened. In the distance, you could hear the ground rattle. The asphalt of the highway was mere distance from you. You kept slithering and once in the middle of the road, you waited for the right opportunity.

The man raised something from his hips and pointed at you. A weapon, although not something you recognize. In the distance, a red four seater is coming nearer. All you need is a whole ten seconds and you are free from your pursuer. The man pulled the trigger and a line of electricity surged. With luck, it missed. It barely scratched your left but its near presence alone turned your surface tangible. Another pull of the trigger and another swerve to the left. The electricity hit the asphalt and left a smoldering patch. One hit from that thing and you're toast.

The car whizzes above you. Your tentacles latched on. Your pursuer cursed and reached for his contact.

"Target found transport. Red Ford Focus. Californian Plate and going for the I-5. Further instructions requested."

The voice from the other end did not talk for a few seconds. "Engage code yellow."


The ride was hot, windy and dry. Inch by inch, you slither your way inside the car. A guy was alone inside. From the looks of it, he's in his early 20s and probably lean in shape. His hair was ash and beneath those eyelids, a hazel eye shows the lack of focus in the road.

The heat from the outside has decreased your mass by half. And whatever that pursuer did to you, it left bits of you to crystallize and hinder your ability to crawl as fast. You needed to recuperate fast. A barrel of water or something might help.

You look around. It seems that you are in the interstate 5 and pretty much far from your home. From the movies you watched, going back home isn't the sharpest idea right now. Whoever these people are, it's a matter of time before they fund out who you are. So for the least, you should hitch this ride and transfer vehicles.

Above you, the person driving is unaware of your presence. Or the way you are nearing him and latching a tentacle near his face. A second was all it took before you completely engulf his face. He was trashing but kept his hands steady on the steering wheel. Mere moments later, the last bits of you are slithering down the man's throat. The fight for the mind was as easy as the fight outside. He was taken unawares and he did not have the time to strengthen his will. He gave in as soon as you entered.

You blink momentarily and saw the world swirl into black and brown. The road stretched long and the dessert widened on both sides. You adjusted the rear mirror and inspected your face better. Rugged at first sight. His chin is unshaved and has a small scar running from the bottom. Your eyes are hollow hazel and deep with bags. This guy has probably seen better days.

You revved up the speed of the car, careful not to reach the speed limit. A minute later and you topped at a diner at the side of the road. The parking lot seemed stocked with cars, mostly civilian vehicles. It's the start of the summer and most people are going to Vegas. Inside the diner, the smell of pancakes and bacon welcomed your nose. As it turns out, this host you are currently possessing haven't eaten breakfast, let alone dinner. But there's no time for that. You head to the bathroom and towards a stall which seemed the cleanest. Getting in was easy but getting out, not so much. It took most of your willpower to regurgitate yourself out. By the end of it, your previous host is foaming in his mouth. Not dead to say the least, but unconscious for several hours.

You slither yourself out of the stall and rushed at one of the sink. You turned the tap and absorb as much as you can drink. All the while, you so at out the crystallized pieces of you down the drain. It was a pain I have them inside you. Once back at full size, you flattened yourself and snuck at a tube that lead to the diner ceiling. With your wide perspective, you spied several viable host you can try on.

First is a family of three, a dad and his twin 12 year old sons. You looked around and it seems that the father doesn't have a wedding ring. His two twin sons are fighting over the maple syrup while the dad was too busy scrolling through his phone.

On another tale to the left, a group of jocks are locked on to the television where a football game is playing. A blonde among them is shouting slurs with a southern accent. While the rest are shushing him to oblivion.

On the table to the right of the father, a familiar sight welcomes you. It's Blake Clay and his younger brother Richard "Rich" Clay. Lives a few blocks away from you and way more popular than you. They might be the ticket to check your family or in some ways, stay at your hometown.

In a moment, you ponder. The family, the jocks or the "Clay's". Who do you choose?
14.title: Choice four

choices: Remain a passenger on the car
15.content:
Excitement is something most people feel when they ride a roller coaster or do something strange. Excitement is a good thing in moderate amounts. But as for James who is currently possessing the body of an unknown hunter in the woods, his excitement is bearing him down. Without focus, he underestimated the willpower of the hunter, let alone see how determined the hunter is in removing him from his body.

"What the fuck!?" The hunter cursed. Something weird jumped at him. He doesn't know if it is an animal or something. But all he knows that it's desperately trying to get inside his body. With his willpower and a large inhale and spit, he managed to spit out most of the thing attacking him. He looked at it and saw that it is gleaming blue amidst the green and brown surroundings. He inhaled once more and spat more than he could do back home. There was no time to hesitate, he pulled open his rifle and shot whatever that things is. With one shot, he hit the thing straight through its main body. Another shot then another and another until all eight bullets are used. He glanced, and stood amazed that his actions were all for naught. All eight bullets, without their canisters, are floating at the body of that hideously cerulean monstrosity. Once again, he did not hesitate as he ran away towards his truck.

James on the other hand, has his excitement replaced with fear and then replaced with relief like a rollercoaster's quick twists and hoops. So far, bullets are ineffective against him. But so far, he has no host to escape this musky forest. He also realized that he needs serious concentration if he is ever going to posses someone. As he slid from trees to trees, he kept a lookout for some weak minded animals to take over. The shots from the hunter's gun scared the animals away and the only soul left for miles is James'. Nevertheless, he kept moving and moving he was mere inches away from the interstate road.

The cars whizzed and strobed in a flash of colors. Big trucks, small cars, strange vehicles and two wheeled motorcycles sped past James. He looked sidewards and saw a steady stream of cars coming his way. James concentrated and formed an appendage as thin a straw yet as long as a broom. He pulled and twisted his appendage, like a lasso and flicked it towards a random car he hit. As is with the cars, James was pulled in a blinding speed, away from the forrest and into whereever this car is going. Judging from the sign, he must be going somewhere over north. Specifically, Colorado.

Anyway, as the car sliced on the great green landscape, James managed to enter the car on one of its numerous hidden entrances. Inside, the cool breeze of the AC surprised James. The cold tingles ran through the surface of his translucent skin and shivered his non-existent bones. On the driver's seat was a man, of great mass. His face was almost engulfed with a huge clean cropped brown beard.

"Another hour and we're there." The driver said.

A man who's somewhat younger sat shotgun beside the driver. Although, unlike the driver, this guy is just starting to grow a beard. "You've been telling that for the last three hours."

Behind the driver are two boys who are uninterested with the ongoing conversation between the driver and the shotgun. On the left seat was a teenager with bright brown eyes and a dirty wood colored hair. He has his earphones tightly packed on his ear while fiddling with his social media account on his phone. On the right however, a kid, probably 13 to 15, is fiddling with his phone to. Like the person beside him, he was more interested in the cartoon playing on his phone rather than the bickering of the people in front of him.

"Well, I like to keep you people excited on our trip." The driver said.

"We're already excited for the past few days. And it says here on my GPS, that we won't be reaching Seattle till Monday morning."

"Bah!" The driver groaned. "You and your techno gizmo. I prefer to use the method I grew up with."

"Well whatever you say dear." And the shot gun kissed the driver on his bushy cheeks and proceeded to fiddle his phone like the boys at the back.

As this fight between the new and the old are unfolding, James temporarily forgot that he is a being capable of possessing bodies and bad one at that. Well, maybe not this time. As the four people fell into a mellow silence, he decided that he must pick one. And this time, he needs all the focus he could get.
15.title: Thrown out

154.content:
Picking the kid is probably the best, James thought. One thing, is that kids have little to no willpower and they are easier to overpower since they are younger. Luckily for James, the kid is distracted with his phone. The element of surprise is at his hand but the only problem is, how can he do it without alerting the three other guys at the car. James stood silent as he came up with a rather dangerous idea.

------

“What was that?” The driver said. The other passengers are too distracted to notice that something nudged at the back of the car. Come to think of it, the three other passengers felt that the car is wriggling a lot. With most of the vibrations coming from the right backside of the car. The driver slowed down and signaled to the other drivers that he is going to take a halt at the nearest clearing.

Once properly parked, all occupants of the car went outside to see that one of the tires somehow deflated.

“We just vulcanized that tire before we left. Don’t tell me it’s punctured.” The shotgun grumbled.

“Don’t worry. Just sit back and I’ll look into this.” The driver assured. He went to the trunk and procured several tools to fix the current conundrum.

James saw this as a chance. He unlatched himself from the underside of the car and followed the smallest feet he could see. In a bit of luck, the little runt decided to have himself some nature trek in the nearest woods. James elongated himself like a snake and slithered through the grass, still like a snake. The boy went farther and farther but not without the eye contact of one of his guardian. He looked around the green and brown surroundings and found himself a dry stump. He flicked away bits of dirt away from the stump and sat on its woody surface and proceeded to fiddle back with his phone. On the other hand, James slithered neared and nearer until he was a mere movement away until he could touch the boy. In one silent but deadly strike, he coiled himself around the boy’s face like the face hugger from the Alien movies. The driver was too preoccupied with finding objects that could have punctured the car wheel, while shotgun was too busy watching the driver and lastly, the teen was still fiddling with his social media. This gave James the chance to focus on possessing the boy and dominating his already feeble mind. Liter by liter, James entered the boy’s orifices. All the while, he felt the tingle that made him connect with the boy’s mind. In rush he never felt before, another set of memories, different than his own, entered his mind. His name is Stan Woods, age 12 and skilled in playing soccer. He had a brother named Ian Woods, age 19, lanky and one of the rare handsome nerds. His father is named Jonathan Woods, age 48 and he is the driver of the car. The shotgun was surprisingly their father’s husband. Well, 2nd husband. His name is Oliver Sparrow, age 32 and Stan seems to think that he is a secret superhero judging from the cool name.
With one blink, a thousand sensations returned at once to James. The smell of pine and decaying wood. The sound of the tools and the frustrated groans of his superhero father. He could taste the lingering flavor a bacon and egg breakfast they had. And he could feel the heat of his body against the gradual cold.

“I’m this kid.” James muttered in Stan’s high pitched but somehow cute voice. “I’m a fucking kid.” He silently screamed.
In just a matter of hours, James’ life was flipped not just upside down but splashed everywhere. He read stories online about this kind of powers. He joined groups with other people with the same interests. Together, they made stories, illustrations and captions doing this exact same thing. But now, it’s not on the realms of imagination anymore but a power he could truly use for himself. At his phone, a cartoon was playing on Youtube and this means that the phone has data. James could reveal himself with his circle of Internet friends and maybe, he could meet up with them.
154.title: The Kid

info.brief_description: You are a new recruit in the government and they need you for a new project.
info.description:
It was just an average day and you were living a normal life. Until an accident happened to yourself and changed your life forever. You are James a typical teenage boy, 18 years old and a senior in high school. You have some friends but not overly popular. You have two parents, a mom named Martha and a dad named Robert. Also you have an annoying younger sister (15) named Brittany and an older brother named Tony (19) which you admire, even though he may treat you harsh at times.
*****


Rules for this interactive

Chapter additions should be at least two paragraphs long

Try to keep it more to MtoM possessions, but any are just fine!
